verses.name: Mark 14:66
verses.text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:

verses.name: Mark 14:67
verses.text: And when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.

verses.name: Mark 14:68
verses.text: But he denied, saying, I know not, neither understand I what thou sayest. And he went out into the porch; and the cock crew.

verses.name: Mark 14:69
verses.text: And a maid saw him again, and began to say to them that stood by, This is one of them.
